testcase.name: Customer performs search using specified filters and orders the results
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to Ebay Home page...........................................passed When user searches for "shoes"..............................................passed Then search results are shown...............................................passed When selects brand "PUMA"...................................................passed Then search results are shown...............................................passed When selects size "10"......................................................passed Then search results are shown...............................................passed Then the test prints in console the number of results.......................passed When user orders the products by "price" in "ascendant" mode................passed Then the test asserts the order taking the first "5" results................passed When the test takes the first "5" products with their prices................passed
